tier.item: (1) a. pilok yengca-ka ttena-ess-telato/eto, (ke peulo-nun po-l manha-e.)
{CA} Youngja-Nom leave-Past-{VE `although'}, that program-Top see-Fut be worth-Decl
`Although Youngja doesn't appear, (that program is worth watching.)'

(2) manyak chulswu-lul manna-telato (ke kes-ul mal haysenun antoyn-ta.)
{CA `if'} -Acc meet-{VE `although'} that thing-Acc must not say-Decl
`Even if you meet Chulsoo, (you should not say about that thing.)'

(3) salam-tul-i [[yengca-ka pilok ttena-se] caemi-ka telhata-ko] ha-telato, ...
people-Pl-Nom Youngja-Nom {CA} leave-as interest-Nom be less-Comp do-{VE `although'}
`Although people say that it is less interesting because Youngja left, ...'

(4) chelswu-nun [[cikwu-ka amuli yelsimhi phenphenhata-ko] wuki-taka]
Chulsoo-Top earth-Nom {CA `however'} laboriously be flat-Comp argue-Comp
kkwucilam-ul tut-eto, ...
be scolded-{VE `although'}
`Even though Chulsoo has been scolded by arguing very tenaciously that the earth is flat, ...'

(7) a. [ney-ka pilok ton ttaymun-ey manyak kwun-ey ka-key toy-myen]
you-Nom {CA1} money because of {CA2} military-at go-Comp become-{VE2}
yengja-ka ttena-lcilato
Youngja-Nom leave-{VE1}
`Even though Youngja may leave you, if you join the armed service because of money, ...'

{CA} nobody school-at/to come-Compl not-Intention do-{VE `if'}
`If nobody intends to come to school, ...'
